text: (Yusuf naayaza) nga atandikira ku migugu gya bwe nga tannatuuka ku mugugu gwa Mugandawe olwo naakijja mu mugugu gwa mugandawe, bwe tutyo bwe twayamba Yusuf naasalira bagandabe amagezi (anti) yali tayinza kusigaza mugandawe okusinziira ku nkola ya Kabaka (we Misiri) singa Katonda teyayagala, tusitula amadaala g'abo betuba twagadde era waggulu wa buli mumanyi waliyo omumanyi (asingako)
